name: Cj's grief
description:
CJ has not been in his normal state for some time and from time to time he wanders around the forest without realizing it. As someone who has come to this forest to find the secret of his success, you must reach it with the help of Big Smoke and Shirek's advice.

W A S D to Move

E and Q to interact

TAB to inventory and Quests

SHIFT to sprint

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK to zoom

LEFT MOUSE CLICK  to fire

1,2,3,4 to change weapons

this is my first real game and made in 2 weeks.
